      • ChargingStationHandler

        public ChargingStationHandler(ChargingStation station)
        Constructor of ChargingStationHandler.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • creationChargingTable

        public final void creationChargingTable()
        Create a 2-dimention array. The first dimention is the number of Charger objects and the second is 500. Every charging which takes place in a Charger object of the ChargingStation is represented in this array.

      • creationDisChargingTable

        public final void creationDisChargingTable()
        Create a 2-dimention array. The first dimention is the number of DisCharger objects and the second is 500. Every discharging which takes place in a DisCharger object of the ChargingStation is represented in this array.

      • creationExchangeTable

        public final void creationExchangeTable()
        Create a 2-dimention array. The first dimention is the number of Exchange Handler objects the ChargingStation has. The second is 500. Every battery exchange which takes place in an ExchangeHandler object is represented in this array.

      • checkUpdatePredefinedSpace

        public final void checkUpdatePredefinedSpace()
        If the updateMode equals 0 then this function is called every time the library wants to check if an update storage is needed. The function accordingly to the choice of the user(month, day, hour, minute) calculates how many n spaces have passed since the last update storage. Then calls the updateStorage function n times.

      • checkUpdateMadeSpace

        public final void checkUpdateMadeSpace()
        If the updateMode equals 1 then this function is called every time the library wants to check if an update storage is needed. The function accordingly to the choice(updateSpace) of the user calculates how many n spaces have passed since th last update storage. Then calls the updateStorage function n times.

      • updateStorage

        public final void updateStorage(int point)
        Update the storage of the ChargingStation with the new amounts of energy of each source.
        Parameters:
        point - The number of update. The function reads the cell with this value of the array with the future energies of each EnergySource object and adds it to the storage of the ChargingStation. At the same each amount of energy it is added to the according source of energy in the ChargingStation.

      • reTimeOfCharging

        public final long reTimeOfCharging(int index1,
                                   int index2)
        Returns the value of a cell of the ChargingArray.
        Parameters:
        index1 - Value of the first dimention.
        index2 - Value of the secong dimention.
        Returns:
        0 if there is not any charging taking place in the given time, or 1 if there is a charging taking place in the given time.

      • reTimeOfDisCharging

        public final long reTimeOfDisCharging(int index1,
                                      int index2)
        Returns the value of a cell of the DisChargingArray.
        Parameters:
        index1 - Value of the first dimention.
        index2 - Value of the secong dimention.
        Returns:
        0 if there is not any discharging taking place in the given time, or 1 if there is a discharging taking place in the given time.

      • reTimeOfExchange

        public final long reTimeOfExchange(int index1,
                                   int index2)
        Returns the value of a cell of the ExchangeArray.
        Parameters:
        index1 - Value of the first dimention.
        index2 - Value of the secong dimention.
        Returns:
        0 if there is not any exchange taking place in the given time, or 1 if there is a exchange taking place in the given time.

      • energyDistribution

        public final void energyDistribution(long date)
        Distribute the ebergy across the ElectricVehicle objects. In case some ElectricVehicle objects arrive together and the ChargingStation's energy is not enough, then this function is called and distribute the energy. Each ElectricVehicle takes a percentage of the total amount. The percentage is the energy the ElectricVehicle demands to the total energy of all the ElectricVehicle objects.
        Parameters:
        date - The time the ElectricVehicle object arrived.

      • calculatePrice

        public final float calculatePrice(ChargingEvent w)
        Calculates the cost of a charging.
        Parameters:
        w - The ChargingEvent that executed.
        Returns:
        The cost of the charging.

      • calWaitingTime

        public final int calWaitingTime(ChargingEvent y)
        Calculates the amount of time a Driver has to wait until his ElectricVehicle can be charged. This calculation happens in case a Vehicle inserts has to be inserted in the list.
        Parameters:
        y - The ChargingEvent that has to wait.
        Returns:
        The waiting time.

      • calDisWaitingTime

        public final int calDisWaitingTime()
        Calculates the waiting time of a DisChargingEvent.
        Returns:
        The time the ElectricVehicle has to wait.
